fields.name: Escorihuela Gascón
fields.description: Extremely popular, Argentinian Malbec is an inky, medium-bodied, dry red wine with strong impressions of dark fruits on the nose and palate.

fields.name: La Grande Voute Côtes du Rhône
fields.description: Red fruit, blackberry red currant. Medium bodied, medium ~ high acidity.

fields.name: Calvet Prestige Bordeaux
fields.description: This wine comes from the Bordeaux Region of South West France, the home of some of the worlds finest wines. Maison Calvet has been at the forefront of Bordeaux wine production since it was founded almost 200 years ago. The Prestige cuvee from Calvet is a specially selected blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon and is carefully matured in our cellars.

fields.name: Petit Chablis
fields.description: Fresh dry white wine with an aroma of green apple, light floral nuances and some dairy. The juicy flavor structure is balanced and mild in the aftertaste.

fields.name: Bollinger Brut Special Cuvée
fields.description: Clear, light yellow in color with golden core. A luscious fragrance with complex aromas, light toast and made under a great deal of oxygen: typical of Bollinger's style. A Champagne full of character with a lot of elegance and reserve.
fields.grape_variety: White Pinot Noir variety, Chardonnay and White Pinot Meunier.

fields.name: Moët & Chandon Brut Imperial
fields.description:
Colour: An elegant golden straw yellow color with green accents
Smell: A sparkling nose with the spicy intensity of green apple and citrus fruits, the freshness of mineral nuances and white flowers and the elegance of more mature notes such as brioche, cereals, fresh notes.
Taste: A combination of generosity and subtlety with juicy white fruit (pear, peach, apple), the soft liveliness of nuances of citrus fruit and gooseberry and a seductive caress of fine bubbles.

fields.name: Veuve Clicquot Brut
fields.description:
Veuve Clicquot Yellow Label brut is extremely stylish both in appearance and taste. The full, firm structure and rich taste make it a real pleasure. This is a Champagne for the connoisseur (the real gourmets).
Colour: Golden yellow with playful, dynamic bubbles. 
Smell: Yellow and white fruit, followed by notes of vanilla and brioche.
Taste: Fruity, fresh and powerful with pear, citrus and notes of longer maturation in the bottle, working towards a nice vinous aftertaste full of various fruit and almonds.
fields.grape_variety: Chardonnay, Pinot Noir and Pinot Meunier

fields.name: Blauburgunder Riserva
fields.description: In the glass it has a intensive ruby red colour with a perfume of ripe cherry and berry. On the palate it is round and full, has velvet tannins and a well balanced acidity. In the end it get accompanied with light herb notes and is long persistent.

fields.name: Solarita Chianti Docg
fields.description: Refined dry wine has a harmonious acidity and pleasant fruity taste. It has clear golden straw colour and a refreshing scent with notes of ripe apple.

fields.name: Castellore Pinot Grigio delle Venezie
fields.description: Enticing aromas of fresh pear are mixed with almond and brown bread and the flavour adds apple pie.

fields.name: Ca'Montebello di Scarani Luigi
fields.description: Straw yellow, luminous and bright, a young fresh floral fruity perfume a pleasant, full and elegant wine.

fields.name: French Wine Package
fields.description: A friendly priced wine package with six delicious wines from France.

fields.name: Champagne Package
fields.description: Two bottles of the iconic champagne of the house. The best-selling and best-known champagne worldwide.

fields.name: Dom Perignon Blanc Vintage
fields.description: Dom Pérignon 2008 has a complex and clear scent, a mixture of white flowers, citrus and stone fruit. The overall effect is enhanced by the freshness of anise and crushed mint. Followed by aromas of spicy, woody and toasted notes. The persistence is mainly aromatic, grey, smoky and promising.

fields.name: Louis Bouillot Cremant de Bourgogne Rosé
fields.description: The blend combines wines, rosés and reds, chosen according to each vintage for perfect regularity of color and aromas. An intentionally short aging of 12 months allows it to reveal all its personality while preserving its freshness and fruity character.

fields.name: Ruinart Blanc De Blancs
fields.description: Beautiful pale golden yellow with soft green reflections, a really vibrant and radiant color. Aroma is very intense at first with notes of fresh fruit, especially ripe citrus, followed by a floral fragrance with notes of white flowers and fruits such as white peaches and pineapple. A smooth, harmonious attack on the palate, very round. Vinosity that is not exaggerated, supported by an excellent freshness. Notes of nectarines, citrus fruits with a pleasant mineral quality in the long and very refreshing finish.

fields.name: Inama Soave Classico 2020
fields.description: Not fruit-driven; mineral and floral notes that clean the palate. On the nose there is the nectar of field flowers such as camomile, elderflower, and iris. Mineral on the palate with an almond finish, typical of Classic Garganega.

fields.name: Marlborough Silver Frond Sauvignon Blanc
fields.description: A vibrant dry Sauvignon bursting with ripe gooseberry and herbal aromas over a luscious fresh lime and crushed nettle palate.

fields.name: Palacio de Menade Blanco
fields.description: Palacio de Menade is clean, citrusy, and quite refreshing. It is a leaner style, without any of the tropical fruit sometimes present in wines from Rueda.

fields.name: Talamonti Moda' Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
fields.description:
The dry red wine has a light texture and medium finish. 
Aroma and Palate notes: Tobacco, blackberry, sour cherry and plum

fields.name: Luigi Bosca A Rosé Is A Rosé Is A Rosé
fields.description: Blend of Pinot Gris and Syrah showing some bright touches of apricot, strawberries and rock driven mineral aromas. Flavours embellish crisp mouthwatering pink grapefruit, honeydew, lime juice and herbal chive chewiness. Acidity is high with a light body and finish.

fields.name: Broadleaf Cabernet Sauvignon
fields.description: Intense notes of cassis and ripe black cherries in an approachable smooth juicy fruit cordial style.

fields.name: L'impossible Grenache Rosé
fields.description: L'impossible Grenache Rosé is a dark pink, dry rosé with a combination of red fruits and spicy impressions in bouquet and taste.

fields.title: Highly recommended
fields.user_review: Delicious red wine. Nice to drink as it is, but also with food.
